full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DUS GSUM RGYAL BA KUN GYI YAB GCIG BU RJE BTZUN 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS LA MCHOD CING GSOL BA GDAB PA'I RIM PA 'JAM DPAL MNYES BYED MCHOD SPRIN RGYA MTSO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @023A *, ,(CES DUS GSUM RGYAL BA KUN GYI YAB GCIG BU RJE BTZUN 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS LA MCHOD CING GSOL BA GDAB PA'I RIM PA 'JAM DPAL MNYES BYED MCHOD SPRIN RGYA MTSO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, LHA MCHOG 'DI NYID LHAG PA'I LHAR BSTEN PA'I PIR THOGS DBANG PO DPYOD LDAN DGE SLONG YE SHES BRTZON 'GRUS LAGS NAS KUN LA PHAN PA'I LHAG PA'I BSAM GYIS, KHO BOS SNGAR MDO CHOG DANG PHYOGS MTHUN DU BSGRIGS PA'I RJE BTZUN BYAMS MGON GYI PHYAG MCHOD DANG CHA 'DRA BA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG GI CES KYANG DGOS ZHES NAS NAN TAN TU BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS 'JAM DPAL DBYANGS DNGOS BSHES GNYEN DAM PA DU MA'I BKA' DRIN LAS, ,MDO SNGAGS KYI CHOS TSUL MANG DU THOS PA'I BTZUN RGAN ^DAM TSIG RDO RJES DGE LDAN BRAG RI'I SDE YID DGA' CHOS 'DZIN 'PHEL RGYAS GLING GI GTZUG LAG KHANG DU BSGRIGS PA'I YI GE PA NI, BLO LDAN GZHON DU DGE SLONG DON GRUB BZANG PO DPAL GYIS BGYIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN 'GRO YONGS LA PHAN PA RGYA CHEN PO 'BYUNG BAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
